tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Complicated Pregnancy Treatment,
review:
“This gentle cesarean was amazing - the family had complete trust and open communication with their doctor and team, and every one of their wishes were granted. ⁣
⁣
For the moment of birth the nurse anesthetist leaned forward and offered to help mom to see, and upon Mom’s first glance her hand went up to reach for baby as we all heard “It’s a BOY!” Tears of joy and big smiles spread all around the OR and soon after this moment, he was on Mom’s chest ❤️⁣”

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
****** ***** *** ** * **** **** ******** She explains clearly to the patient about the treatment.. She is very supportive.. She helped me in getting a baby with normal delivery... 
Thank you mam...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: As per doctor during the 26th week she advised to terminate the pregnancy because of some reports shows protein level was getting passed in urine at higher frequency. We decided to take a second opinion *** **** ** ********* *** ****** ** **** ***** ******** ** ******** ********* *** ** **** *** we are blessed with a baby boy during 33rd week of pregnancy both mother and kid are fine now and my baby is 3 month old healthy. **** ** ****** ** * ***** **** ****** ** ** ***** ** ***** **** **** * **** *** ****** **** ****** ** ** ******* * ********* ****** *** ** *** **** ** ********** ****** **** ****** * **** *** ********** ** * ***** **** * ********* ***** ********* **** ****** ** ********* *** ****** *** ********* *** ******* ******* ****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have visited doctor on 19th for my wife pregnancy checkup as well for Viral fever. Her health went really bad so had to consult the doctor again on 22nd (Like within 4 days of earlier consultation). Today before visiting the hospital I have contacted the front desk team they informed doctor will be available between 6pm - 8pm. Now the time is close to 7:30 pm the doctors presence is no where. For any doctors (or any professional person) time sense is very important especially for doctors you cannot take someones health for granted if she cant manage her time there should be someone else. The only reason I’m waiting is because I already consulted this doctor so donna try another doctor with different medication. This would be last time I visit this hospital. The management needs to address these on a high note. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: *** ** **** **** ****** the way she speaks with the patients there feel good she explains every thing with clear manner
